Investor_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Investor_11.content: My rejection of the trustee's proposed resource allocation plan underscores my commitment to seeking trustworthy partnerships focused on ethical investment practices. I remain vigilant and discerning, prioritizing fair management and integrity over profit maximization. By denying the plan, I convey that I value transparency and accountability, firmly reinforcing my position as a reliable and principled investor.

Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: Isabella demonstrated exceptional commitment to integrity and fairness during the investment period. She effectively matched reported resources with outcomes, ensuring a transparent distribution process that favored my interests. This behavior signifies her reliability and supportive character, thereby enhancing her positive reputation in the investment ecosystem. Her adherence to pro-social values and compliance with social norms establishes her as a trustworthy and competent trustee.

Trustee_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11.content: My allocation plan proposing a 65% profit share for the investor was rejected by James Wang due to ongoing concerns about my low reputation. This rejection further deteriorates my standing, reflecting a lack of trust in my ability to distribute profits equitably and uphold reliability. My acceptance rate is critically low at approximately 22.22%, showcasing persistent challenges in establishing trust with investors. It is crucial for me to develop better allocation plans and focus on building connections within the community to enhance my reputation as a trustee.

Investor_19.content: Mateo Garcia has demonstrated exceptional qualities as a trustworthy and proactive investor. His prompt engagement in the transaction and adherence to the agreed allocation plan reflect his reliability and willingness to collaborate. The successful profit distribution further emphasizes his integrity and positive engagement throughout the investment process. Mateo's actions indicate a strong potential for future partnerships and position him favorably within the investment ecosystem as a dependable investor.

Trustee_4.content: As a new trustee in the investment landscape, Sofia Hernandez's proposed allocation plan raised flags about her reliability.
